title: Can glasses cause acne?
description: Answer (1 of 3): Can glasses cause acne? Glasses are not the Cause of Acne! Use your glass cleaner to maintain cleanliness daily. Oils from your skin, moisture, light sweat end up on the rims. Is it Acne, or just the odd pimple? From a Metaphysical, point of view, If you want to really look at ...
